channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- McAfee Total Protection (MTP)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- McAfee Total Protection (MTP)

item.title: CVE-2021-23877|2024-08-03T19:14:09.221Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20total%20protection%20%28mtp%29
item.description: Privilege escalation vulnerability in the Windows trial installer of McAfee Total Protection (MTP) prior to 16.0.34_x may allow a local user to run arbitrary code as the admin user by replacing a specific temporary file created during the installation of the trial version of MTP.
